turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you call the Starbucks on HIghway 50 and order me a coffee drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A Cinnamon Dolce Latte, Hot please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok got that. Anything special?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I really like it as is, but ask to leave off the whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok got that no whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You have my password for the Starbucks site?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes I do.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great go ahead and order it online.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not a problem there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok so lets reconfirm

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am ordering a Cinnamon dolce latte, hot, no whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good place the order please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All done! It will be ready for pick up at Highway 50 Starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Did the site say my credit card is stored?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes this drink is paid for, all you need to do is show up

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect! Order whatever you want as well. On me

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh thank you very much!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Not a problem. It's double star day!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: LOL

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks again I'll be there in 20 min or so

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are very welcome!
